bike.description: Double butted Reynolds 520 Cr-Mo, FGFS geo, singlespeed-specific, integrated headset, MID BB shell, hydra-formed chainstays, removable U-brake bosses, 3D-forged horizontal dropouts w/ integrated chain tensioners
